channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Wreck and Ruin of Anti-Trump Lawfare
item.description: Democrats failed utterly in their abuse of the law and now reap the consequences, while Trump imitates their failures, expecting a different result.

item.title: Spanberger Won’t Condemn School Board Member For Sympathetic Emails To Sex Offender Using Girls’ Bathroom
item.description: A Spanberger spokeswoman refused to address the then-candidate's exchange of sympathetic emails with sex offender Richard Kenneth Cox.

item.title: What to Make of the Trump DOJ’s Letitia James Indictment
item.description: It appears that DOJ standards have changed.

item.title: Young Republicans challenge 2020 census results as part of wider GOP attack on head count
item.description: Two young Republican groups have challenged statistical methods used to produce the results of the 2020 census, four years after the numbers were rele...

item.title: Trump strikes with AstraZeneca to lower drug prices for Americans
item.description: The Trump administration has reached a deal with pharmaceutical giant AstraZeneca to cut its drug prices, marking it the second drugmaker in as many w...

item.title: Democrats see GOP divide on Obamacare subsidies as reason to keep shutdown leverage
item.description: Congressional Democrats said they won't end the shutdown in part because they don't trust Republicans to address health care once the government reope...

item.title: Margaret Thatcher Docudrama Shows What Media Corruption Stole From Us
item.description: Brian and Maggie shows how a good interviewer can still reveal much about a subject that the subject does not necessarily want to reveal.

item.title: Democrats Are Giving Up On Democracy
item.description: It doesn’t matter how unpopular Democrats’ policies are, they are not going to negotiate, they are not going to compromise.

item.title: Trump Snub Proves The Nobel Peace Prize Is A Joke
item.description: Just one day after the two-year anniversary of the horrific October 7 attack by Hamas, it was announced that Israel and Hamas accepted the terms of Pr...

item.title: To Secure the Next American Century, America Will Need Her Allies
item.description: We must demand more of our allies, and through trade, integration, and cooperation lead them to ensure that we can maintain the U.S.-led order.

item.title: Trump heaps 100% tariff on Chinese goods as payback for Beijing's restrictions on rare earths
item.description: President Trump says he will impose a 100% tariff on all Chinese imports in response to Beijing's move to restrict rare earths and other exports, as a...

item.title: Peru wakes up to 7th president in less than a decade after President Boluarte ousted by Congress
item.description: Peruvians woke up to their seventh president in less than a decade Friday, as 38-year-old Jose Jeri took the reins of the shaken nation after Congress...

item.title: Katie Porter’s Nasty, Abusive Attitude Is Standard, Antisocial Democrat Behavior
item.description: You simply do not hear stories about berated staff from Republicans in Congress or the West Wing. Antisocial behavior is a Democrat thing.

item.title: The Gonzo Brilliance of Trump’s Gaza Diplomacy
